name: White Dragon Wyrmling
senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 12

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Cold Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales a 15-foot cone of frost. Each creature in that area makes a DC 12 Constitution saving throw  taking 10 (3d6) cold damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

special_abilities.name: Cold Mastery
special_abilities.desc: The dragons movement and vision is not hindered by cold, icy surfaces, snow, wind, or storms. Additionally, the dragon can choose to burrow through snow and ice without leaving a trace.
